People are really really dumb huh. NTR literally means "beloved getting stolen". If your beloved mom run away with your friend, that is NTR, you dumbass. Especially, two dumbass below me, educate yourself.

Why is everyone saying this is ntr? The son LITERALLY gave his friend the go ahead on dating his mom. Should he have sent the images/videos? No he shouldn't. In the end though the mother decided that she liked the friend (and now the father to her new child) more than her son. Does it suck, yes BUT she made a choice and the son didn't stop her so if anything it's the son who's at fault for letting it get this far and not trying to stop it. In conclusion the son gave permission to date his friend who then proceeded to make a new life with the sons mother. Not ntr, if you think it is then you're dumb.
